    • AppointmentRequest

      public AppointmentRequest​(Patient requester, Doctor doctor, java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Default constructor. Additionally, this constructor adds the resultant object to its corresponding repository: RequestRepository.
      Parameters:
      requester - the patient requesting the appointment.
      doctor - the requested doctor.
      dateTime - the requested dateTime for the appointment.
